column5: Hey folks. Wondering if anyone has any idea of ice conditions on Pigeon. I was hoping to go next weekend if the ice is there. I'll be going south of the narrows on the east side.  Thanks
very very little stay close to shore if ya go next weekend midlle just froze up. 5 inchs in some bays in omemee but middle is open. Drill every 5 10 ft if ya do go
